metadata.description: A romantic, unreliable narrator leads us through his interplanetary coming-of-age story, as an older Moonshadow recounts his strange mixed-species birth in outer space, his escape from a deep-space zoo, and his struggles to survive in a war-torn universe. Known as America's first fully painted graphic novel, the poetic, philosophical, and groundbreaking Moonshadow gets a deluxe treatment, with a new introduction by creator J.M. DeMatteis and a bonus section featuring early concept work. ''Its lovely. It makes you feel better about comics.''–Frank Miller
metadata.name: Moonshadow
